overview:
Zainab Zaki handles operations, marketing, business development, client interaction at Intellect Strategies Inc. Zainab represents the next generation of business leaders adding diversity and growth to organizations while co-existing with older generations to form powerful synergies. She has diverse experience working in large (Capgemini consulting) and small (Satyam Computer Services) organizations resulting in an innate ability to see the big picture of corporate cultures. She is passionate about connecting the dots for people, building bridges, and finding simpler ways of making things work.

At Capgemini, Zainab, managed a â‚¬30M SAP clientele base. The projects involved collaborating with several Fortune 500 accounts, global investment banks and numerous medium sized vendors. She was the sole management and decision making contact amongst all collaborating entities.

Her passions include Seth Godinâ€™s ideas and helping to create powerful support systems for people. She recently started a Seth Godin meetup group in DC with raving success.

degrees.subject: Entrepreneurship and Strategic Marketing
degrees.institution: McCombs School of Business, University of Texas at Austin
